resources.string: Value with same already in group

This application allows you to convert some values into others. 

 By default, the application can translate the values of length, weight and volume. 

 To add a new value to the converter 

 1. go to the "Add value" tab 
 2. enter the name of the group, the name of the value and the value of the value 

 2.1 (try to set values relative to one value. For example, for length values, set values relative to meters, for weight - relative to grams, and for volume - relative to liters). 

 3. After entering all the values, click the "Add" button and you will see either a message about adding if all the parameters are entered correctly, or an error message in case of some problem in the data. 

 To add your converter, simply enter a unique group name when adding a new value. 

 To convert values 

 1. go to the "Convert" tab. 

 2. First, select the converter group (you can choose either from the default groups or from the ones you added). 

 3. Click the "Confirm" button. 

 4. Now select the initial and final values that you need. 

 5. Enter the number in the initial value and the number of decimal places for rounding (by default, 2 decimal places are used). 

 6. Click the convert button and in the "Result" field you will see either an error message or the converted value.
